intro: Urophyllum nigricans, commonly known as the black-flowered urrophyllum, is a species of flowering plant native to the tropical regions of South America. Urophyllum nigricans typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories. Its leaves are usually broad and lance-shaped, with a smooth or slightly hairy surface depending on the species variation.
